dcterms:description: A dataset extracted from Bitcoin trading platforms where users can score others on a scale of -10 to +10, with edges higher than 0 treated as positive edges.

dcterms:description: A who-trust-whom network crawled from a consumer review site where users can notate trust or distrust to reviews of other users.

dcterms:description: A social network of a user community site where users tag others as friends or foes, allowing the construction of positive and negative edges.
